meanings.sent1: The inhibitive rules made it hard to have fun.
meanings.sent2: The inhibitive regulations limited our creativity.
meanings.sent3: The inhibitive signs at the park made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her inhibitive nature was like a heavy chain around her.

meanings.definition: Serving to prevent, prohibit, or hinder
meanings.sent1: The inhibitive measures stopped the project from moving forward.
meanings.sent2: His inhibitive behavior made it difficult for others to express themselves.
meanings.sent3: The inhibitive lock on the cookie jar was no match for my sweet tooth.
meanings.sent4: The inhibitive walls seemed to close in on us.
meanings.sent5: The inhibitive force field surrounded the treasure, keeping it safe.
